title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 572.14 - Public hearings on projects
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 572.14 - Public hearings on projects

State Regulations

Public hearings on projects, except those hearings to be
held solely to consider an associated variance application, shall be noticed
and conducted in the manner specified in Part 580 of these
regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
572.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
